interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 3 Pieces Messy Donut Chignons Hair Piece Scrunchies Synthetic Extensions Updo Hair Bun for Women Scrunchies Natural Black #1b
Review Date: 2020/08/08
Store: SHINYSHOW
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'UPC': '738630490242'}
Review Text: My hair is a 3/4 medium to dark brown with some red undertones. I went with the 1b natural black because the 4 was described as light brown. Light brown is usually a 5. I suggest you go with the number instead of relying on the description. This is still a good product and will match my hair when I first color it... it is always a bit darker. Unfortunately, I was not blessed with thick luscious hair so my buns are super thin (see pictures). This scrunchie is made of synthetic hair and easy to use. I only need to use one but it came with three buns. This is an added bonus because over time synthetic hair will become frizzy and tangled. Also with synthetic, you can not color it or use heat on it.
Review Title: Great to add umph! to your messy bun!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Red Carpet Manicure Starter Kits
{'Color': 'RCM Essentials Starter Kit', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'RC Red Carpet Manicure', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'UPC': '817248203854', 'Manufacturer': 'RC Red Carpet Manicure/ Zupishi'}
I know gel polish has been around for quite some time but I actually switched from dip powder to gel. I do my own nails and just find dip to be messy and time consuming. I figured at this point all gel systems were the same, so I’ve been using a cheap brand. I came across this kit and definitely notice the difference in Red Carpet. It’s much better quality. Your gel polish will last 21 days if you follow the directions. Five stars from me and it’s a great value!
Red Carpet... the difference in quality is noticeable!
AUGNORYE 13 Pcs Hair Cutting Scissors Kit, Professional Hair Barber Scissors Kit with Thinning Shears, Home Hair Shears for Women, Men, Kids
AUGNORYE
{'Brand': 'AUGNORYE', 'Included Components': 'Scissors', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel'}
I was looking for a decent set of scissors to trim my daughters hair. This set exceeded my expectations. The Sheers have a nice weight to them, comfortable in your hands. The cuts are precise. The kit come with great accessories. All are useful, only complaint is the brush is cheaply made.
Strudy scissors!

SHINYSHOW
{'UPC': '738630490242'}
My hair is a 3/4 medium to dark brown with some red undertones. I went with the 1b natural black because the 4 was described as light brown. Light brown is usually a 5. I suggest you go with the number instead of relying on the description. This is still a good product and will match my hair when I first color it... it is always a bit darker. Unfortunately, I was not blessed with thick luscious hair so my buns are super thin (see pictures). This scrunchie is made of synthetic hair and easy to use. I only need to use one but it came with three buns. This is an added bonus because over time synthetic hair will become frizzy and tangled. Also with synthetic, you can not color it or use heat on it.
Great to add umph! to your messy bun!
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Nail Care Enthusiast**: Continues to show a strong interest in nail care, particularly in DIY applications with a shift towards gel systems from dip powders.
- **Hair Care Interest**: Recently expanded focus on hair care, indicating an interest in products that enhance hair styling and volume.
- **Preference for Quality**: Values high-quality products that deliver on performance and longevity for both nails and hair, carefully selecting items that align with their specific needs.
- **DIY Approach**: Enjoys hands-on applications, favoring kits and products that offer effective solutions across grooming routines.
- **Product Longevity**: Seeks durable and lasting hair care solutions, emphasizing the importance of products that maintain their integrity over time.
- **Positive Experience with Brands**: Demonstrates loyalty towards manufacturers known for high-quality offerings in grooming products, reflecting satisfaction with previous purchases.
- **Practicality**: Prioritizes practical and efficient solutions that simplify grooming processes, enhancing overall satisfaction and ease of use.
- **Versatility in Grooming**: Appreciates the utility of grooming tools that provide comfort and precision, extending interests beyond nails to include versatile hair care options.

Overall, this user maintains a strong focus on quality, practicality, and personal engagement in their grooming routines while exploring new avenues in hair care to complement their existing nail care interests.
